entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.4°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
